content: flower choker © mimi alelis 2007 materials gauge 8 double_crochet sts = 1 using 1 75mm hook small amount cotton thread size 8 or size 10 flower crochet hook 1 50mm or 1 75mm chain 5 join into a ring with slip_stitch i used cotton thread size 8 and round 1 * chain 7 slip_stitch on top loop only on 2nd 1 75mm hook chain from hook and on the next 5 chs slip_stitch clasp or closure for necklace on ring repeat from * 7 times more 8 yarn needle for finishing petal centers a few wooden beads round 2 * slip_stitch on 1st st of next petal single_crochet in each of the next 5 sts chain 2 on the opposite side of the same petal single_crochet on next 5 sts slip_stitch on last st repeat from * for the other petals fasten_off leaving 12 tail for sewing choker/ necklace chain 107 115 123 for approx 14 15 16 finished size double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and on each chain photo by tina http //timelesscreations blogspot com across crochet tip for a better look work the dcs on the back ridge of foundation chain fasten_off leaving 8 for sewing assembly and finishing spray or dampen the pieces with tap water lightly press and shape with your fingers leave to dry on a clean cloth or towel attach the clasp on the necklace sew beads on the flower then sew the flower on the necklace weave in ends photo by lily http //lilygo blogspot com/ photo by deneen http //www yarnsandmusings com/ photo by mimi http //mycrochetstuff blogspot com/ more crochet designs supplies and tips from mimi alelis at http //mycrochetstuff blogspot com/ http //mimi csa googlepages com/
